---
title: "Kia EV9 Overall Review"
format: html
---

The Kia EV9 is a bold, all-electric three-row SUV with up to 304 miles of range, seating for 6 or 7, and loads of tech like a 30" digital cockpit, fast charging, and lounge-style seats. It’s quick, spacious, and packed with safety features—perfect for families who want futuristic style and everyday practicality.
